comment: Must be one of the best online courses I have taken just because profession is very responsive and caring. Take this class , you will thank me later. She works very hard ti make course helpful for her students and it shows.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Online course, Professor is very responsive - in fact I had to reach out in middle of the night to ask a question and got a response within minutes . She truly cares about what she teaches and wants students to learn and grow. Maybe most caring professor I have ever had

Pretty ok course, but the programming instructions where pretty vague, I recommend having a tutor for them. I was lucky to have previous programming experience going into the course. The exams and quizzes were open notes so it was easy to tackle, make sure to start the programming assignments early and you'll do fine.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: This class honestly wasn't too bad. The only problem was the Clearwater software we used rarely worked properly, but that was not her fault. She responded to emails quickly and graded fairly so I believe that was great. The midterm, final, and project make up like 60% of the grade so those are pretty important.

The professor herself is very understanding and helpful when it comes to the class. But the class itself is a pain, literally, my only B this semester because I failed both the midterm and final (each one was over 300-500 slides also lockdown/camera). A couple of very time-consuming projects but this class was just annoying. Alright professor tho.

Nicely structured and clear grading criteria. Horrible lectures. It seems like she is giving a lecture without knowing what she is giving a lecture on. I am not questioning her intelligence, as she is a very smart lady, I am questioning her preparation for the lectures she was giving.

Gunjan was cool. Her class was really easy, no attendance policy and all of the tests/quizzes were open note. Only downside was it was a 3 hour course. Good thing about that is attendance wasn't required. She's cool and nice, though. Would take again.
